name: Floria virtual garden
description:
Design your garden the way only you envision it.

Create stunning flower arrangements.

Make your own greeting cards to share with friends.

Hidden surprises are everywhere!

Everything is a puzzle and it is up to you to solve how to navigate the world of Floria.

Discover over 700 different floral elements, such as wildflowers, vases, fillers, ornaments and more. And, with monthly updates and holiday events, there will be always something new added to your collections.

You could spend hours making your own flower arrangements with the flowers you've grown. With unlimited possibilities, there will be no two bouquets alike.

Make your own greeting cards for many occasions and send them to your friends and loved ones!

Play mini games, solve puzzle and collect pearls to exchange for rewards!

At last, envelop yourself in a zen atmosphere that does not make you feel you are in a cartoon. Everything is hand painted by the artist, not 3D or software created. Enjoy many ASMR elements of Floria.

It is your own virtual garden, first of its kind, ever!
